cards.thai: ตัวใครตัวมัน
cards.ex: It's always been every man for himself in this industry.

cards.thai: ไปกันเลย ลุยกันเลย
cards.ex: Whenever there was work to be done, he skedaddled.

cards.thai: ตบมือข้างเดียวไม่ดัง
cards.ex: I hadn't been all that easy to deal with, myself—it took two to tango

cards.thai: ความสามารถที่มีมาโดยกำเนิด
cards.ex: he says females are innately predisposed to learn about people and their emotions

cards.thai: อึ้ง ทึ่ง งง
cards.ex: When the children went to see the magician, they were dumbfounded when he made a rabbit disappear.
